first_para: Sir Alexander John Randall, (born 5 August 1955) is a Conservative politician in the United Kingdom, and was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Uxbridge and then later Uxbridge and South Ruislip.

full.extract:
Sir Alexander John Randall, (born 5 August 1955) is a Conservative politician in the United Kingdom, and was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Uxbridge and then later Uxbridge and South Ruislip.
He was the Conservative Deputy Chief Whip between May 2010 and October 2013.
full.title: John Randall (British politician)
